query:
SELECT 
  p.name,
  COUNT(*) as upgrade_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(pu.statName, ' +', pu.statIncrease) SEPARATOR ', ') as upgrades
FROM player_upgrades pu
JOIN players p ON p.id = pu.playerId
WHERE pu.upgradeType = 'attribute'
AND JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.upgradeType') = '7GM'
GROUP BY p.name
HAVING upgrade_count > 1
ORDER BY upgrade_count DESC
LIMIT 10
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT 
  p.name,
  COUNT(*) as upgrade_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(pu.statName, ' +', pu.statIncrease) SEPARATOR ', ') as upgrades
FROM player_upgrades pu
JOIN players p ON p.id = pu.playerId
WHERE pu.upgradeType = 'attribute'
AND JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.upgradeType') = '7GM'
GROUP BY p.name
HAVING upgrade_count > 1
ORDER BY upgrade_count DESC
LIMIT 10
